name: TheGates
description:
Hello everyone :)

We are building browser like app that has a feature of jumping through portals (following links) between the worlds (pages/sites), that can be hosted and accessed by anyone

And that is the new internet! More interactive, more social and fun

If you wanna host your own world, contact us and we will help you do that. Requirement: Godot 4.0 projects

Feel free to leave a feedback :) Join our discord channel, follow on twitter
